title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union frock coat and shoulder scales with bayoneted musket, cap box, and cartridge box in front of painted backdrop showing lake and trees] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union frock coat and shoulder scales with bayoneted musket, cap box, and cartridge box in front of painted backdrop showing lake and trees] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 16.2 x 13.7 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
